summary: This is an email chain from April 16, 2020, among U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) personnel, discussing scheduling a conference call to review a memo regarding the Epstein investigation and prosecution. It shows internal coordination within the SDNY on the case.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: He requests a conference call to discuss the Epstein investigation and prosecution memo.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.role: Assistant U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: She is copied on the email chain regarding the Epstein investigation memo and call scheduling.

connections.description: Both are legal professionals at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, coordinating on the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Scheduled conference call on Epstein investigation
events.description: A conference call is scheduled for Monday at 11am to discuss the Epstein investigation and prosecution memo.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated April 16, 2020, regarding the Epstein investigation and prosecution.
U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman requests a conference call to discuss a memo on the Epstein case.
The correspondence involves multiple SDNY personnel, indicating ongoing internal review of the Epstein prosecution.
